phrases: A month after I moved to Tokyo,
When I was darkness at that time
God, I have only one request
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I want to need your love
I worked so hard and saved up before coming here,
yet I only have 2,228 yen left.
If you spend your money, it runs out.
You went on this crazy spending splurge of clothes and furniture.
But Mr. Mizukoshi gave me a good deal on everything I got from there.
On top of that, rather than cash,
he offered to deduct the amount for the clothes I got from my salary.
That is why you did not have much of a salary to bring home last month.
Do you have enough money to get by, Nana?
You do not have a full-time job, just temporary stuff from time to time.
Unlike you, I do not waste my money.
- Thank goodness. - Do not rely on someone else's money!
I have no intention of doing so.
You see, if we both did not have money, that leads to anxiety, do not you think?
You are relying on my money!
We agreed to split the rent for this place, exactly half-half.
If you cannot make arrangements for funds by the end of the month,
It would not bother you if I lay in the streets dying, would it, Nana?!
Dying once may do you good!
I will be late for work.
What kind of work are you doing at this hour of the night?
Have a good night with the ghosts.
This is no time to be afraid of ghosts.
There is over half a month until my next payday.
I did not come to Tokyo to experience this!
To make it on my own?
Then solve this on your own.
That is for you to figure out!
But I do not know how to be a dominatrix!
Talk to Shoji and have him feed you until the end of the month.
If I talk to Shoji about this he will hate me,
and no longer want to be with me, for sure.
Also he is very busy with work and his studies at university,
so I would only be a nuisance bothering him at this late hour.
Use this to hold you over until the end of the month.
I am not giving it to her.
Give Nana cash, and you are certain it will be all gone in a day.
That is a cruel thing to say, Jun-chan.
I will share it with you.
You can feast on this until the end of the month.
Hey, what about meat and vegetable dishes?
My next payday is on the 26th.
If I do not buy anything from the store, I will receive at least 70,000 yen.
But I will be debited for my cell phone,
so I should deposit 10,000 in my bank account.
I only need to pay half the rent and utility bills,
so 60,000 should be more than enough.
But I will only have a little left over.
And I will hafta survive another full month with that little amount.
Now I have gone past being scared.
I am beginning to feel depressed.
You can go on your lunch break.
I will be skipping my lunches for a while.
I have decided to go on a diet.
So that is why you are looking under the weather today.
It would not be proper to invite you out at such a time.
I wanted to take you to dinner.
Think about what you want to eat.
But it is okay, I guess.
There is no big deal about having a meal together.
After all, it is not as if Mr. Mizukoshi has the hots for me.
So this does not qualify as cheating on my boyfriend.
I was waiting for you that whole time.
I am really sorry about that.
I think I can make it.
I really think you should pick your friends more carefully.
But like I said, she is usually a really good girl.
Well, I was just as surprised.
You have the same employer, go to the same university,
and enroll at the same faculty.
Guess you pretty well hafta get along.
Yes, but Sachiko was accepted on her first try,
so she is two years younger.
She asked me to call her that.
There was no reason to refuse.
But I am telling you, it is not like that!
I am proud that you are holding back.
Mr. Kyosuke, which would you prefer?
That is going to be trouble.
Well, I am more for the dark-skinned big girls like you, but...
Well, excuse me for my dark skin.
But even I find her cute.
Shin, I did not notice you there.
I never knew you could play the drums too, Nana.
Back home while I was in a band, I learned it for fun.
Why do you know about Yasu?
Because when Nobu gets drunk he always talks about Yasu.
Last night too, he kept saying how he wished that Yasu was here.
You stayed over at Nobu's place again?
Those are Nobu's clothes, are not they?
Nobu's at work right now, and said he may be a bit late.
Shin, you should return home once in a while.
I will bet your parents are worried.
Then it is fine, I guess.
But it is a fact that there are parents who abandon their children.
That guy who came by the store about the bassist ad, right?
Did not he say he was eighteen?
Nana cornered him with a few questions, and he confessed.
He told us he thought they would not take him seriously
if he said he was a junior high student.
Oh, but it is April, so maybe he is in tenth grade now.
Although he does not seem to be going to high school.
Maybe he did not bother taking the entrance exams.
He does not go into detail about such things.
There seems to be more to it under the surface.
Anyway, he does not go home much, so I am somewhat concerned.
I am sure his parents are totally worried.
And we still have not found a drummer.
It is like our luck's running out.
But did not you say there was a guy who tried out?
Nana turned him down, saying she did not like him.
Although the others said he was pretty good.
Or rather, I think she is in love with Yasu
and therefore refuses to accept a different drummer.
He was her band's leader back in her hometown.
He is a skinhead, and he and Nana look so great together.
Hey, Mr. Mizukoshi, is it okay if I order the meat and potato dish, too?
But was the tavern really okay with you?
I think I might have had a little too much to drink.
Well, I should be going now.
To be honest, I asked you out today
because I wanted to talk to you about something important.
I have been waiting for the right time,
but I just could not bring myself to tell you.
This could come as a surprise to you.
I am well aware what I am about to say will trouble you, Nana.
I am not ready for this.
I have been waiting for the right time,
but I just could not bring myself to tell you.
This could come as a surprise to you.
I am well aware what I am about to say will trouble you, Nana.
I am not ready for this.
You see, I plan on closing shop.
You will miss the last train!
You knew you would hafta run for the last train.
So why did you hafta wear those shoes?
It is on my way home, anyway.
But It was my fault we missed the last train.
It was from your girlfriend, right?
It is my policy not to accept such money from a guy who has a girlfriend.
It appears that this is all the money I have right now.
You are always working so hard.
You really are spending it all on Sachiko!
I am studying computer graphic design, after all.
I wonder if we can get a good price for it.
But how else am I going to get proper food from tomorrow!
I will share this with you.
Pickled plums my grandma made herself.
So, now that I was unemployed, I was lost,
seriously contemplating the possibility of starving to death in the streets.
Mr. Mizukoshi deposited 300,000 yen for severance pay!
Are you sure you that is not 30,000?
Your remaining salary would have amounted to around that much.
Then do you think this 300,000 yen is to sever his relationship with me?
Why would he give you that much if you did not?!
Mr. Mizukoshi is returning to his hometown
I feel that I have been deceived.
The one who deposited the 300,000 yen was not Mizukoshi.
You are a long way from independence
if you are crying to your parents for money.
But I did not tell I was having money problems!
I thought, if I told them they would make me go back home.
Now I have got all this money, let us celebrate with sukiyaki tonight.
Back home, my mom would make sukiyaki
when we had something to celebrate.
Let us go back to the supermarket to buy what we need.
What is there to celebrate about?!
The fact that I got money...
Be remorseful for the money you have wasted!
We are having natto soybeans tonight as planned.
You are not eating any meat until you find a job.
Say, should not you call Natsuko and thank her?
If you call now, you would be embarrassed
because you will cry the moment you hear mommy's voice.
You get homesick too, sometimes, do not you Nana?
Since I do not have a home.
There you go, trying to be cool again.
Tonight calls for sukiyaki, after all!
Yasu, Blast is the band you started.
I was so worried I could not sleep at night.
Besides, there are law firms in Tokyo too.
Do you still think that you do not have a home anywhere?
This dinner table by the window, and the chairs.
They are still there, just as they were back then.
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
My hand had no place to go
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
